column4: will *buntu 8.10 repos have the new versions of i.e. VLC (0.9.2), eclipse (3.4), gimp (2.6.0), etc? Version refreshes are a bit far apart at times. (Eclipse is still 3.2 i 8.04).
yay for vlc!! :-) but eclipse is still 2 releases behind :-(
Eclipse is easy to install from the tarball though, it's just Java after all!
